names.english: lindera powder to smooth the flow of qi
names.commonEnglish: Lindera Powder to Smooth the Flow of Qi

actions: Promotes movement of Qi, warms the Kidneys, disperses Cold and alleviates pain.
With Ma Huang and Jiang Can, for Wind attacking the extremities with joint pain, numbness, headache, and dizziness.
With Chen Pi, Ma Huang, Chuan Xiong and Jiang Can, for stroke due to wind-Cold Attacking the Channels and Collaterals.
Regulates Qi, adjusts the Middle, descends Qi, dries Dampness and transforms Phlegm.
Extinguishes Wind, stops spasms and convulsions, disperses Wind-Heat and stops itching and pain.
With Bai Zhi, for frontal headache.
Induces sweating, releases the Exterior and disseminates and facilitates Lung Qi.
Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi, expels Wind and
alleviates pain.
Opens the Lungs, spreads Lung Qi, expels Phlegm, benefits the throat and opens and raises Lung Qi, directing the effects of other herbs to the upper body.
With Gan Cao, for Excess disorders in the Upper Jiao with no disorder in the Lower Jiao.
Warms the Middle, expels Cold and dispels Wind-Dampness seeping into the Lower Jiao.
With Gan Cao, for epigastric pain and vomiting due to Spleen and Stomach Deficiency Cold.
Promotes the movement of Qi.
With Jie Geng, regulates the flow of Qi in the chest and aids in the transformation of Phlegm.
Expels Wind, eliminates Dampness, unblocks the nasal passages, dispels Cold and alleviates pain.
With Chuan Xiong, for headache.
Warms the Middle, harmonizes the Stomach, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
With Jie Geng, for pain and swelling of the throat.
(Releases the Exterior, induces perspiration, disperses Cold and reduces the toxicity of other herbs.)
(With Da Zao, for External Wind-Cold.
With Ma Huang, strongly creates sweating to treat all externally contracted Wind-Cold disorders.)
(Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.)
Dispels Wind
Promotes the circulation of Qi
Eliminates Phlegm
Dispels Dampness
Stops pain
syndromes: Cold attacking the chest and axilla

symptoms: Muscle and tendon stiffness and paralysis
Deviation of the eyes and mouth

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with amenorrhea due to Blood Deficiency.

modifications.purpose: post-stroke paralysis with Qi and Blood Deficiency
Cold and pain in the extremities
swelling and edema in the legs
